Grippers

  • grippers.base_gripper

Grippers#

The grippers module is a collection of the grippers used in the experiments of the main package. Each gripper is derived from the optim.grippers.base_gripper.Gripper base class. Grippers extract the gripper configuration from the simulation and have to generate functions that calculate the grasp forces and contact point positions given a gripper configuration.

Note

At the moment, only the ParallelJaw gripper is implemented.

grippers.base_gripper#

Gripper base module.

class optim.grippers.base_gripper.Gripper(info: Dict)#

Base class for grippers that interface the gripper kinematics with the optimization.

abstract create_kinematics(con_pt: Dict) → Callable#

Define a function that calculates the link’s contact point position.

Parameters

link – The link name.

Returns

A function that calculates the contact point position given the gripper configuration.

abstract create_gripper_constraints(opt: optim.core.optimizer.Optimizer) → Callable#

Create and add gripper specific constraints to the optimizer.

Parameters

opt – Optimizer.

abstract property joint_limits: numpy.ndarray#

Joint limit property.

Returns

The joint limits.

create_constraints(opt: optim.core.optimizer.Optimizer)#

Create the gripper configuration constraints.

Parameters

opt – Optimizer.

grippers.parallel_jaw#

ParallelJaw gripper module.

class optim.grippers.parallel_jaw.ParallelJaw(info: Dict)#

Class to interface the ParallelJaw gripper kinematics with the optimization.

property joint_limits: numpy.ndarray#

Joint limit property.

Returns

The joint limits.

create_kinematics(link: str, _: Dict) → Callable#

Define a function that calculates the finger tip position.

Parameters

link – The link name.

Returns

A function that calculates the finger tip position given the gripper configuration.

create_grasp_wrench(link: str) → Callable#

Define the function to calculate the grasp wrench of the given link.

Parameters

link – The link name.

Warning

Currently unused, has to be adopted to new optimization variable definition. If used, the optimization variable additionally has to contain the next joint positions to calculate the grasp wrench with the P-controller of MuJoCo.

Returns

A function that calculates the grasp wrench.

create_gripper_constraints(opt: optim.core.optimizer.Optimizer)#

Create and add a constraint to couple the gripper fingers.

Parameters

opt – Optimizer.
